name: Geoff Voelker
content: Geoffrey M. Voelker Geoffrey M. Voelker Professor research Systems and Networking Research Group Security and Cryptography Research Group recentpublications Canvassing the Fingerprinters: Characterizing Canvas Fingerprinting Use Across the Web Luo, Ritter, Savage and Voelker.
